title: Help
content: My kcet rank is 3482. I belong to gm. Is there any chance that i can get a computer related seat in pes. If not then where should I try

comments.body:
I think you might get AIML EC campus. If not , follow this list https://youtu.be/GodReMyZe-c 
(I would suggest trying for CSE core because you will easily get a cs related branch at DSCE or other clg but cse core is always to be preferred. )
[Cse core >> cse + spec >>>>>>>> only specification]
Is DSCE good I heard a lot of reviews about the crowd isn't good there

Bruh why you even worried 
3.4k is easy to get a cse seat in pes ec campus 
Wayy easily, if not in first round , 2nd round you'll get a seat defo
According to last year's cutoffs, you will get CS at the Electronic City campus (It cut off at 5.6k). But nothing in the main campus, even AIML at RR cutoff at 2.8k
Chutiya ppl gang you'll find everywhere. Dsce isn't any worse peer group wise
We really need to stop referring to RR as the "main campus". This mindset is old and outdated. Both campuses are equivalent now.
